For <math>x \in \mathbb{F}^{n},</math> the additive inverse of <math>x,</math> denoted <math>-x,</math> is the vector <math>-x \in \mathbb{F}^{n}</math> such that
<math>
x+(-x)=0
</math>

In other words, if <math>x=\left(x_{1}, \ldots, x_{n}\right),</math> then <math>-x=\left(-x_{1}, \ldots,-x_{n}\right)</math>
